name: AccurateMassSearch
description: Match MS signals to molecules from a database by mass.

name: AssayGeneratorMetabo
description: Assay library generation from DDA data (Metabolomics)

name: BaselineFilter
description: Removes the baseline from profile spectra using a top-hat filter.

name: CVInspector
description: A tool for visualization and validation of PSI mapping and CV files.

name: ClusterMassTraces
description: Creates pseudo spectra.

name: ClusterMassTracesByPrecursor
description: Correlate precursor masstraces with fragment ion masstraces in SWATH maps based on their elution profile.

name: CometAdapter
description: Annotates MS/MS spectra using Comet.

name: ConsensusID
description: Computes a consensus of peptide identifications of several identification engines.

name: ConsensusMapNormalizer
description: Normalizes maps of one consensusXML file

name: DTAExtractor
description: Extracts spectra of an MS run file to several files in DTA format.

name: DatabaseFilter
description: Filters a protein database (FASTA format) based on identified proteins

name: DatabaseSuitability
description: Computes a suitability score for a database which was used for a peptide identification search. Also reports the quality of LC-MS spectra.

name: DeMeanderize
description: Orders the spectra of MALDI spotting plates correctly.

name: Decharger
description: Decharges and merges different feature charge variants of the same peptide.

name: DecoyDatabase
description: Create decoy sequence database from forward sequence database.

name: Digestor
description: Digests a protein database in-silico.

name: DigestorMotif
description: digests a protein database in-silico

name: EICExtractor
description: Extracts intensities from dedicates positions in a LC/MS map

name: Epifany
description: Runs a Bayesian protein inference.

name: ExternalCalibration
description: Applies an external mass recalibration.

name: FLASHDeconv
description: Ultra-fast high-quality deconvolution enables online processing of top-down MS data

name: FalseDiscoveryRate
description: Estimates the false discovery rate on peptide and protein level using decoy searches.

name: FeatureFinderCentroided
description: Detects two-dimensional features in LC-MS data.

name: FeatureFinderIdentification
description: Detects features in MS1 data based on peptide identifications.

name: FeatureFinderMetabo
description: Assembles metabolite features from centroided (LC-)MS data using the mass trace approach.

name: FeatureFinderMetaboIdent
description: Detects features in MS1 data based on metabolite identifications.

name: FeatureFinderMultiplex
description: Determination of peak ratios in LC-MS data

name: FeatureLinkerLabeled
description: Groups corresponding isotope-labeled features in a feature map.

name: FeatureLinkerUnlabeled
description: Groups corresponding features from multiple maps.

name: FeatureLinkerUnlabeledKD
description: Groups corresponding features from multiple maps.

name: FeatureLinkerUnlabeledQT
description: Groups corresponding features from multiple maps.

name: FileConverter
description: Converts between different MS file formats.

name: FileFilter
description: Extracts or manipulates portions of data from peak, feature or consensus-feature files.

name: FileInfo
description: Shows basic information about the file, such as data ranges and file type.

name: FileMerger
description: Merges several MS files into one file.

name: FuzzyDiff
description: Compares two files, tolerating numeric differences.

name: GNPSExport
description:
Tool to export representative consensus MS/MS scan per consensusElement into a .MGF file format.
See the documentation on https://ccms-ucsd.github.io/GNPSDocumentation/featurebasedmolecularnetworking-with-openms

name: HighResPrecursorMassCorrector
description: Corrects the precursor mass and charge determined by the instrument software.

name: IDConflictResolver
description: Resolves ambiguous annotations of features with peptide identifications

name: IDDecoyProbability
description:
Estimates peptide probabilities using a decoy search strategy.
WARNING: This util is deprecated.

name: IDExtractor
description: Extracts 'n' peptides randomly or best 'n' from idXML files.

name: IDFileConverter
description: Converts identification engine file formats.

name: IDFilter
description: Filters results from protein or peptide identification engines based on different criteria.

name: IDMapper
description: Assigns protein/peptide identifications to features or consensus features.

name: IDMassAccuracy
description: Calculates a distribution of the mass error from given mass spectra and IDs.

name: IDMerger
description: Merges several protein/peptide identification files into one file.

name: IDPosteriorErrorProbability
description: Estimates probabilities for incorrectly assigned peptide sequences and a set of search engine scores using a mixture model.

name: IDRTCalibration
description: Can be used to calibrate RTs of peptide hits linearly to standards.

name: IDRipper
description: Split protein/peptide identification file into several files according to identification run and annotated file origin.

name: IDScoreSwitcher
description: Switches between different scores of peptide or protein hits in identification data

name: IDSplitter
description: Splits protein/peptide identifications off of annotated data files

name: InternalCalibration
description: Applies an internal mass recalibration.

name: IsobaricAnalyzer
description: Calculates isobaric quantitative values for peptides

name: JSONExporter
description: Exports .oms (SQLite) files in JSON format

name: LuciphorAdapter
description: Modification site localisation using LuciPHOr2.

name: MRMMapper
description: MRMMapper maps measured chromatograms (mzML) and the transitions used (TraML)

name: MRMPairFinder
description: Util which can be used to evaluate labeled pair ratios on MRM features.

name: MRMTransitionGroupPicker
description: Picks peaks in SRM/MRM chromatograms.

name: MSFraggerAdapter
description:
Peptide Identification with MSFragger.
Important note:
The Regents of the University of Michigan ("Michigan") grants us permission to redistribute    
the MS Fragger application developed by Michigan within the OpenMS Pipeline and make available 
for use on related service offerings supported by the University of Tubingen and the Center for
Integrative Bioinformatics.                                                                    
Per the license agreement the use of the pipeline and associated materials is for academic     
research, non-commercial or educational purposes. Any commercial use inquiries                 
must be directed to the University of Michigan Technology Transfer Office at                   
techtransfer@umich.edu. All right title and interest in MS Fragger shall remain with the       
University of Michigan.

For details, please see the supplied license file or                                           
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenMS/THIRDPARTY/master/All/MSFragger/License.txt

name: MSGFPlusAdapter
description: MS/MS database search using MS-GF+.

name: MSstatsConverter
description: Converter to input for MSstats

name: MaRaClusterAdapter
description: Facilitate input to MaRaCluster and reintegrate.

name: MapAlignerIdentification
description: Corrects retention time distortions between maps based on common peptide identifications.

name: MapAlignerPoseClustering
description: Corrects retention time distortions between maps using a pose clustering approach.

name: MapAlignerTreeGuided
description: Tree guided correction of retention time distortions between maps.

name: MapNormalizer
description: Normalizes peak intensities in an MS run.

name: MapRTTransformer
description: Applies retention time transformations to maps.

name: MapStatistics
description: Extract extended statistics on the features of a map for quality control.

name: MascotAdapterOnline
description: Annotates MS/MS spectra using Mascot.

name: MassCalculator
description: Calculates masses and mass-to-charge ratios of peptide sequences

name: MassTraceExtractor
description: Detects mass traces in centroided LC-MS data.

name: MetaProSIP
description: Performs proteinSIP on peptide features for elemental flux analysis.

name: MetaboliteAdductDecharger
description: Decharges and merges different feature charge variants of the same metabolite.

name: MetaboliteSpectralMatcher
description: Perform a spectral library search.

name: MultiplexResolver
description: Completes peptide multiplets and resolves conflicts within them.

name: MzMLSplitter
description: Splits an mzML file into multiple parts

name: MzTabExporter
description: Exports various XML formats to an mzTab file.

name: NoiseFilterGaussian
description: Removes noise from profile spectra by using Gaussian filter (on uniform as well as non-uniform data).

name: NoiseFilterSGolay
description: Removes noise from profile spectra by using a Savitzky Golay filter. Requires uniform (equidistant) data.

name: NovorAdapter
description: Performs de novo sequencing of peptides from MS/MS data with Novor.

name: NucleicAcidSearchEngine
description: Annotate nucleic acid identifications to MS/MS spectra.

name: OpenMSDatabasesInfo
description: Prints the content of OpenMS' enzyme and modification databases to TSV

name: OpenMSInfo
description: Prints configurations details of OpenMS.

name: OpenPepXL
description: Tool for protein-protein cross-linking identification using labeled linkers.

name: OpenPepXLLF
description: Tool for protein-protein cross linking with label-free linkers.

name: OpenSwathAnalyzer
description: Picks peaks and finds features in an SWATH-MS or SRM experiment.

name: OpenSwathAssayGenerator
description: Generates assays according to different models for a specific TraML

name: OpenSwathChromatogramExtractor
description: Extract chromatograms (XIC) from a MS2 map file.

name: OpenSwathConfidenceScoring
description: Compute confidence scores for OpenSwath results

name: OpenSwathDIAPreScoring
description: Scoring spectra using the DIA scores.

name: OpenSwathDecoyGenerator
description: Generates decoys according to different models for a specific TraML

name: OpenSwathFeatureXMLToTSV
description: Converts a featureXML to a mProphet tsv.

name: OpenSwathFileSplitter
description: Splits SWATH files into n files, each containing one window.

name: OpenSwathMzMLFileCacher
description: This tool caches the spectra and chromatogram data of an mzML to disk.

name: OpenSwathRTNormalizer
description: This tool will take a description of RT peptides and their normalized retention time to write out a transformation file on how to transform the RT space into the normalized space.

name: OpenSwathRewriteToFeatureXML
description: Combines featureXML and mProphet tsv to FDR filtered featureXML.

name: OpenSwathWorkflow
description: Complete workflow to run OpenSWATH

name: PSMFeatureExtractor
description: Computes extra features for each input PSM.

name: PeakPickerHiRes
description: Finds mass spectrometric peaks in profile mass spectra.

name: PeakPickerIterative
description: Finds mass spectrometric peaks in profile mass spectra.

name: PeptideIndexer
description: Refreshes the protein references for all peptide hits.

name: PercolatorAdapter
description: Facilitate input to Percolator and reintegrate.

name: PhosphoScoring
description: Scores potential phosphorylation sites in order to localize the most probable sites.

name: ProteinInference
description: Protein inference based on an aggregation of the scores of the identified peptides.

name: ProteinQuantifier
description: Compute peptide and protein abundances

name: ProteomicsLFQ
description: A standard proteomics LFQ pipeline.

name: QCCalculator
description: Calculates basic quality parameters from MS experiments and subsequent analysis data as identification or feature detection.

name: QCEmbedder
description: Attaches a table or an image to a given qc parameter.

name: QCExporter
description: Will extract several qp from several run/sets in a tabular format.

name: QCExtractor
description: Extracts a table attachment to a given qc parameter.

name: QCImporter
description: Imports tables with quality control parameters into qcml files.

name: QCMerger
description: Merges two qcml files together.

name: QCShrinker
description: This application is used to remove the verbose table attachments from a qcml file that are not needed anymore, e.g. for a final report.

name: QualityControl
description: Computes various QC metrics from many possible input files (only the consensusXML is required). The more optional files you provide, the more metrics you get.

name: RNADigestor
description: Digests an RNA sequence database in-silico.

name: RNAMassCalculator
description: Calculates masses, mass-to-charge ratios and sum formulas of RNA sequences

name: RNPxlXICFilter
description: Remove MS2 spectra from treatment based on the fold change between control and treatment.

name: SageAdapter
description: Annotates MS/MS spectra using Sage.

name: SeedListGenerator
description: Generates seed lists for feature detection.

name: SemanticValidator
description: SemanticValidator for semantically validating certain XML files.

name: SequenceCoverageCalculator
description: Prints information about idXML files.

name: SimpleSearchEngine
description: Annotates MS/MS spectra using SimpleSearchEngine.

name: SpecLibCreator
description: Creates an MSP formatted spectral library.

name: SpecLibSearcher
description: Identifies peptide MS/MS spectra by spectral matching with a searchable spectral library.

name: SpectraFilterNLargest
description: Applies thresholdfilter to peak spectra.

name: SpectraFilterNormalizer
description: Normalizes intensity of peak spectra.

name: SpectraFilterThresholdMower
description: Applies thresholdfilter to peak spectra.

name: SpectraFilterWindowMower
description: Applies thresholdfilter to peak spectra.

name: SpectraMerger
description: Merges spectra (each MS level separately), increasing S/N ratios.

name: SpectraSTSearchAdapter
description: Interface to the SEARCH Mode of the SpectraST executable

name: StaticModification
description: Applies a set of modifications to all PeptideIDs in an idXML file.

name: TICCalculator
description: Calculates the TIC from a mass spectrometric raw file (useful for benchmarking).

name: TargetedFileConverter
description: Converts different transition files for targeted proteomics / metabolomics analysis.

name: TextExporter
description: Exports various XML formats to a text file.

name: TriqlerConverter
description: Converter to input for Triqler

name: XFDR
description: Calculates false discovery rate estimates on crosslink identifications

name: XMLValidator
description: Validates XML files against an XSD schema.

name: diaproteomics
description: Automated quantitative analysis of DIA proteomics mass spectrometry measurements.

name: mhcquant
description: Identify and quantify MHC eluted peptides from mass spectrometry raw data

name: proteomicslfq
description: Proteomics label-free quantification (LFQ) analysis pipeline

name: quantms
description: Quantitative mass spectrometry workflow. Currently supports proteomics experiments with complex experimental designs for DDA-LFQ, DDA-Isobaric and DIA-LFQ quantification.
